Title: Chandra Mahal is most beautifully and extravagantly decorated
Review: This is an amazing palace - it is huge and so much to see you need to allow plenty of time to visit all of it!  It is beautifully decorated and one of my favourite places is a gate (one of four at Pritam Chowk inside the City Palace) which is exquisitely decorated with several peacocks - it is truly beautiful and shimmers in the sunshine.Take your time to walk around the areas which are open to tourists.  The only part which is closed to the public are the Royal quarters.  There is plenty to see and do.  Make sure you take plenty of water with you when the weather is exceptionally hot.

Name: LuizDutraNeto
Title: At the private quarters of the Royal Family of Jaipur!
Review: While visiting the "City Palace of Jaipur" your attention will be immediately caught by this awesome seven-storeyed building: "Chandra Mahal" or "Chandra Niwas", a palace surrounded by beautiful gardens and a lake. Here, on the upper floors and since 1732, the Kachawas Rajput Clan - the "Maharajah of Jaipur" and the Royal Family still live! The walls of "Chandra Mahal" are decorated with fine paintings, mirror works and floral ornaments. Its ceilings are richly adorned. On the ground floor, "The Maharajah Sawai Man Singh II Museum" displays carpets, manuscripts and other precious items from the Royal Family's collection. The private quarters are not opened for the public, but the Royal Family recently decided to offer tourists the possibility of visiting them! If you wish to visit the inner quarters, you may join their "Royal Grandeur Tour", including guided visits to "Chandra Mahal's" "Sukh Niwas" (the "Hall of Pleasures"), "Chhavi Niwas" (the "Hall of Images"), "Shobha Niwas" (the "Hall of Beauty"), "Sri Niwas" (the "Hall of Mirrors") and "Mukut Mahal" (the "Royal Temple" on the top floor). At only an extra fee of Rs. 2,500.00 per foreign national! If you miss it, you may regret forever! Enjoy!

Name: Kalpit0302
Title: Palace in a Palace
Review: Chandra Mahal is main living palace of royal family inside the City palace of Jaipur. It is not usually allowed to visit here but the palace from outside is really beautiful.

Name: ddevarshi
Title: Out of bounds! Can see it from outside only
Review: This Palace is still being used by decedents of Royal family of Jaipur as their residence so a visitor cannot see it from inside. One can get to see this palace from many locations of Jaipur such as Jantar Mantar, Hawa Mahal Swargasuli or Isar Lat.  However, best and closest view can be had from City Palace or Maharaja Sawai Mansingh Museum II and Pritam Niwas Chowk of City Palace in particular. It is a 7 storeyed building. Each floor has different names such as Pritam-Niwas, Sukh-Niwas, Ranga-Mandir, Chabi-Niwas, Shri-Niwas and Mukut-Mandir. I have seen pictures of interior of this palace in a coffee table book, which shows that it is extremely beautiful.

Name: priteshkulkarni
Title: City palace part
Review: Chandra mahal is the part of city palace located in pink city area. It is of red color and simple designed on mahal. Palace is cleaned and maintained very well.

Name: Bradley T
Title: close to public
Review: The Chandra Mahal is that part of the city palace where the royal family lives.  It is closed to the public.The photos you see on this site are mostly for the area in the city palace just outside the Chandra Mahal.

Name: Anujamouli
Title: So grand!
Review: ChandraMahal boasts of some seriously spectacular architecture and for that alone it is totally worth a visit. The sprawling grounds are well maintained and the guides do a good job of keeping you plied with interesting info.This is probably irrelevant but the vendors outside offer some seriously yummy kulfi which goes very well with the overall experience. But then good kulfi works with practically everything!

Name: triptworld
Title: chandra mahal
Review: a part of city palace jaipur...the chandra mahal is the most beautiful part of city palace..such a beautifully build in 17th century

Name: YAYAWAR
Title: YAYAWAR
Review: Beautiful place in Jaipurt City, Rajasthan, India...its a real time to see and learn about History of our colourful country India

Name: Joe W
Title: Iconic
Review: An iconic part of the City and something that is definitely worth seeing on a trip to Jaipur! A really beautiful piece of North Indian architecture and history.

Name: evakordek
Title: Worth the visit (and expensive entry fee)
Review: Expensive but surprising visit.  Great guide engish fluent and knowledgable.  Surprising rooms and concepts very interesting.

Name: KLE2013
Title: Residence of the Maharaja of Jaipur
Review: Part of the City Palace Museum, the Chandra Mahal is the residence of the Maharaja of Jaipur and closed to the public.  The views of this seven storied palace are stunning as each floor is extravagantly decorated.  A blend of Rajput and Mughal styles, the colonnaded base and intricate facade resemble a wedding cake. Walk outside the City Palace and from the north side of the complex one can catch glimpses of a marvelous garden with peacocks roaming the royal grounds.

Name: farooqguide
Title: Chandra mahal city palace.
Review: This beautiful mahal is a part of city palace museum where jaipur royal family members are residing, this mahal is beautifully decorated with the painting from inside, all the wall and ceiling are full of paintings and this part of the palace was built in 1728.

Name: M C
Title: Good, but not more than that!!
Review: The palace is nice, not that ancient, and being used for wedding ceremonies, if it wan't for the exhibition included, it wouldn't be worth visiting at all.

Name: artmanintoronto
Title: The Most Expensive Bottle of Pepsi Ever
Review: $90 for two adults and you get a long walk up an unlit ramp, see three rooms and have a Pepsi. Most of the palace was off limits to tourists, something we found out about half way through the tour. If what you like on your vacation is the feeling of having been ripped off, this is the place for you.

Name: Jolyon67
Title: Impressive but private
Review: Chandra Mahal is the largest and most private part of Jaipur's City Palace. Most of it remains off limits to tourists because it is still home to Jaipur's royal family. The towering seven storey building dominates the palace grounds and a flag flying whenever the Maharaja is home. Only a museum in the ground floor is open to the public and its adjoining courtyard. Around the courtyard are four elaborately carved doorways representing the four seasons. The peacock door (Autumn) is the best of all.

Name: Pratiksha Raval
Title: Best experience
Review: Excellent wort,beautiful design,vibrant colour.Pratiksha Raval,HOD Hiray institute of Design,Interior dept.

Name: Gulnar Siddiqui
Title: Best experience
Review: Very good collection... excellent work.. original pottery and good quality... must visit  store .. ...

Name: Chinmay
Title: Wonderful
Review: it was a great conversation with Anil ji  her art is incredible.Thank you for the beautiful gift ‚ù£Ô∏è‚ù£Ô∏è

Name: Roshan
Title: Beautiful Blue pottery and more
Review: An exhilarating experience to see the beauty of the Blue pottery. Met Anil ji and he explained the intricacies of the beautiful art and made me make some beautiful jewellery. An experience that must not be missed

Name: Parth Desai
Title: Wonderful pottery and team who works here amazing.
Review: Wonderful experience, beautiful place, great employees. Great quality, easy to buy, and very nice people.

Name: Oshin J
Title: Mesmerising visit !!
Review: It was an absolutely refreshing and memorable visit, walking through the process of how the pottery is made and the detailing and time that goes into each piece .. the owner is a humble and lovely man patient enough to explain and allow us to enjoy the experience.. he also gave us little gifts to always remember the experience.. a must visit in Jaipur

Name: Pulkit S
Title: Blue pottery art
Review: It is a nice place to visit . The blue pottery is the art used since last 10 generation . You can visit here and meet owner Mr. Anil who is really a nice person will give you a detailed description about Blue pottery. I really love the art promoted by him and it must be spread all over the world. I would request you to come here and explore the blue art whenever you are in Jaipur.Thank you Mr. Anil Doraya Ji for this kind gesture ,will never forget this . It the best thing in Jaipur I really enjoyed it.

Name: Nitin Deshmukh
Title: Art love
Review: The ancient indian pottery making experience is awesome, mr. Anil is keeping this art alive. Worth to visit.

Name: Riya Sharma
Title: I just love that place
Review: Hi today we visited blue pottery Art Centre its a beautiful place to and we had wonderful time . The staff and Owner are so polite and so genuine. They are  welcoming and polite . Loved that place ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Kishore
Title: A great experience
Review: We saw many varieties of blue pottery in various forms. Thanks to Anil ji and his team. We look forward to coming again.

Name: Sahana
Title: Great work!
Review: Absolutely stunning hand made collections. Great to witness the Oldest art and feeling blessed to know the story behind these beautiful art. Thank you somuch for the gift and warm welcome!

Name: Jenni L
Title: Beautiful Jaipur blue pottery
Review: Very friendly and helpful owner and artist, the experience was lovely! the pottery is also of course very beautiful, highly recommend!!

Name: Ishita C
Title: Best place for pottery shopping
Review: The shop is full of unique variety with hand painted designs on pottery and the uncle is really polite and helpful for selecting the items. He understands how the process is done for the pottery.

Name: Vasundhara Dani
Title: Best visit
Review: This is an amazing store not just for the beautiful collection they showcase but also for the passion with which Anil uncle shares his knowledge and experiences. Must visit place.This is my second visit to this pretty spot.

Name: Parul Chaturvedi
Title: Blue Pottery Art
Review: I loved being here, it was an amazing soothing experience. I got to know about the history as well as an experience of creating a jewellery on my own.

Name: sharon k
Title: Art
Review: Unique art collection comes from great hands, Reasonable prices  !Must visit place in Jaipur, Rajasthan

Name: Foram Veera
Title: Jaipur blue pottery!
Review: We entered this shop with the thought of making a quick exit but we ended up spending two hours including spending time with the artist who is a national awarded Shri Anil Doraya Ji..  I can not express my experience in words - but this place is a must visit to experience the real blue pottery which Jaipur is famous for! The youth in us must do it's effort to keep this art alive! Thank you! - Foram Veera

Name: Gitanjali Deb
Title: Excellent
Review: What a brilliant experience at Jaipur art gallery . Loved the humble behaviour of the owner Anil Sir, he taught me and my friend how to make a neck piece and gifted us. Simple overwhelmed with his gesture.

Name: Aravind R
Title: Exciting
Review: Had a nice experience here.Anil sir taught our daughter to make a nice pendant. So exciting to be here.

Name: Liam E
Title: Very friendly, lovely product
Review: We loved this shop. Really friendly owners, showed us around the nearby factory. No ‚Äòhard sell‚Äô, but we loved the traditional blue and bought a set of plates. Highly recommend!

Name: Purab C
Title: Great!
Review: Great hands on experience. Highly recommend this place, the owner and staff are great! Great value prices for hand made pottery made within Jaipur.

Name: Sonal Srivastava
Title: Must visit i visited 2 time.
Review: I loved it here and it was mesmerizing experience and what can I do to promote this craft is through digital medium because mostly generations is on online platform and using it daily and we can showcases this art by showing all this process so that people could connect with the process and feel connected and would appreciate the work.

Name: Nancy N
Title: Amazing famous shop
Review: Beautiful shop, we bought a masterpiece, the owner is very friendly and artistic, he gave us good deal. We collect pottery from around the world.

Name: Sarkis
Title: Blue pottery museum
Review: Anil greeted me with his smile and made me feel true happiness with his delicate sense of fashion and amazing collection. Must see in Jaipur.

Name: shrishty singh
Title: The owner is the 9th generation artist from his family carrying forward the legacy of the beautiful Blue pottery.
Review: Amazing place with an amazing collection of the world famous Blue Pottery of Jaipur. A must visit place for all the art enthusiasts. You will definitely find a lot of stuff like plates, flower vases, key holders, coffee mugs, letter tiles and many other things that you really would really want to keep as a souvenir from the Pink City.And particularly the owner of this store Mr Anil Doraya uncle, who is still carrying the legacy of his ancestors as being 9th generation from his family in creating this beautiful art. And the hospitality was the cherry on the top. A for sure recommended place from my side if you plan your trip to Jaipur.

Name: Sudeep Shetkar
Title: Best place for blue pottery
Review: Excellent collection with excellent patterns and amazing people to meet. Very nice and unique experience. Must visit place for blue pottery.

Name: Senjal Pandharpatte
Title: Not just a shop, and experience
Review: Beautiful pottery and very friendly owner. It‚Äôs not just a shop its an experience, they give you information about the age old blue pottery- how its made, it‚Äôs history. They also have a factory where you can take a look at the making of it as well!!

Name: Manuel O
Title: Best place to buy blue pottery in Jaipur
Review: Great place to buy a piece of a dying art that should be preserved and protected. The owner is extremely kind and his family has been doing this for nine generations in Jaipur, he also has some workshops for people interested in learning this beautiful craft. And they take credit card!

Name: dineshkaku
Title: Awesome Experience at Blue Pottery
Review: I went along with my kids and asked Anil to get hold my son and don't let him go, so he can learn pottery. My son skipped but my daughter did the course and was thrilled with her achievements. Anil  felt emotional about the scenario and offered my son free 3 day classes when we come back again. Anil is a fantastic artist and we very friendly. Thank you for a great experience.

Name: Lasya reddy nandyala
Title: Amazing collection
Review: Amazing collection with amazing patterns and amazing people to meetAmazing workshops to learn and visitFrom dr lasya reddy nandyalaVijayawadaAndhra pradesh

Name: Harshathah
Title: Blue pottery experience
Review: We took part in the 3hr workshop. Had a great time. Learned a lot. Mr. Anil was very friendly and taught us so much! Loved the collection as well. 10/10 recommend visiting this place when in Jaipur.

Name: Charan
Title: Excellent
Review: Amazing place to learn pottery and to paint. They are professionals and are very friendly with us. In case you guy‚Äôs visit then pls do take videos in order to help them get reach on social media. I came all the way from Chennai and had a very good experience here.

Name: George P
Title: Great experience on blue pottery
Review: Excellent hospitality. We could gain more  knowledge on blue pottery which we were new to. Artist Mr. Anil Doraya himself explained on the craft and gifted us a souvenir. Such nice and aesthetic pieces can be found here. Would like to visit whenever we are in Jaipur.

Name: Radhika Tilak
Title: Amazing
Review: GEM OF JAIPUR!Must visit place in Jaipur. They have absolutely gorgeous collection of all authentic pottery. Also don‚Äôt fail to visit their newly launched fabric section. It is as special as any other monument in Jaipur. The owner Mr. Anil ji has golden heart.

Name: Samar Pratap Singh
Title: I am extremely happy to see this gallery
Review: What a gallery, must visit. History of Jaipur. History of blue colour. History of Mr Anil doraya. Thanks

Name: shanbirsingh
Title: Must visit , excellent
Review: Awesome, must visit shop , if you missed it then your trip is unsuccessful. Must visit shop in Jaipur.

Name: aish
Title: Good
Review: Very good artistic design. Had fun, they even explained how they make. Workshop was fun. Must visit.

Name: Sayali
Title: Wonderful
Review: A very different and amazing experience. They have very good collection of pottery and the people of the store are pretty welcoming.

Name: Manu G
Title: Excellent
Review: Had a wonderful experience. They probably have the best collection. Apart from pottery, they also sell things like bedsheets and dress materials which are very unique.

Name: Chinmay
Title: Awesome experience!!
Review: An absolutely wonderful experience in this old and famous pottery shop! The owner and chief artist Mr Anil is very friendly and a delight to talk with!I recommend every traveller to visit his shop when in Jaipur!

Name: Abhishek M
Title: Must visit place in Jaipur
Review: Wonderful place for buying pottery. Must visit place in Jaipur. Owner and his team is very helpful. They also have a workshop.

Name: Sunil biswas
Title: Fabulous
Review: Favourite things with awesome collection of true Jaipur poetry art work feels amazing and fabulous..

Name: mitesh
Title: Excellent Work.
Review: Excellent Services And Mind Blowing Blue pottery.Must Visit This Place.. Excellent Work... Excellent Collection..

Name: Safari612801
Title: Amazing, beautiful pottery and gallery.
Review: We had a brilliant time viewing the beautiful art and pottery. We were given lots of knowledge and history. Anil, the artist was a lovely man and offered me a complementary pottery class after our visit.This gallery is a must when you visit Jaipur.

Name: Neha BK
Title: Awesome store for Jaipur Pottery
Review: Had an amazing experience at the pottery size.Also had a very good varasa tea which one must try for sure.The tea was very amazingüòÄ

Name: Phanish
Title: Great, trying to get a mridangam with pottery
Review: Myself being a mridangam artist loved the experience here. The art center owner Anil was very welcoming. He being an artist himself learnt a quite a bit of pottery. We discussed about making mridangam in pottery going back to good old days when instrument was made of pottery.

Name: Lakshita Jain
Title: Factory outlet
Review: We visited the factory and had an amazing experience. They have a very warm personality and they show the work very nicely.

Name: Siddhika
Title: Factory visit
Review: Visited the factory, amazing experience. Loved the products. The factory owner was kind enough to show us around the factory

Name: Manoj Praveen
Title: Best place and Best person
Review: Best Place where you can Find Best Blue pottery in Jaipur. Invited him for my Marriage personally.It's great to be there.

Name: shreeya d
Title: Art worth living
Review: This place should be the first on your list. Please make the time to attend the workshop and walk around the shop. It is worth every second of your time!

Name: Hiya
Title: Varsha Tea and all things beautiful
Review: The artist/owner was very cordial, so proud of the heritage. Went into great details of its history.

Name: Mrinal Dubey
Title: Excellent ‚ú®Ô∏è
Review: We came to Jaipur for a short trip and decided to visit the Blue Pottery Art centre. The experience was surreal. We learnt so much about the art form and worthing here is so beautiful. The owner and his craftsmen are so skilled and helpful. They patiently taught us about the history of this art form and how the artifacts are made. I would highly recommend this place to every one visiting Jaipur.

Name: Sanjana
Title: The unknown art
Review: I had been to jecrc college for a training and came to know about Blue Pottery. The best place to learn the art and shop(if you are a non artist like me) but on the whole a place must to visit

Name: Josh P
Title: Must Visit
Review: The owner and master craftsman of the store gave a lovely presentation of how the pottery was made and how the trade is passed down through generations. He also has a fantastic sense of humor. This is definitely a must visit place while in Jaipur!

Name: Priyanka A
Title: Awesome
Review: It was the best experience ever. Mr. Anil dorahein is very knowledgeable and gave us all the information.A must visit . You cannot go to jaipur and not visit the blue pottery centre.We got our courrier on time.  A little Crack in the plate he replaced it for us. No questions asked.Lovely place.Agrawal.

Name: Rich
Title: Excellent to purchase blue pottery
Review: It is a great shop to see and learn Rajasthan culture under one roof, the great hospitality of the owner makes u feel like home

Name: Tanya T
Title: Jaipur Blue art pottery : an amazing experience !
Review: Very fulfilling experience in this blue pottery art workshop. It‚Äôs amazing how hand art like blue pottery still exists in this age and how important it is to keep it alive

Name: fozjon
Title: good. If this is your thing
Review: my wife has been wanting to go for a long time. To me, it wasn't anything all that special. My wife found many things to buy here. People were kind and the place wasn't too crowded.

Name: sneha a
Title: Great for blue pottery
Review: Really nice experience at the Blue pottery art center where the owner showed the details of the art form and even taught me how to make a pendant in 2 mins.

Name: Pink panthor
Title: Amazing legacy of jaipur
Review: Great art amazing blue pottery met the owner he had a great depth of what's the history and how it evolved to become

Name: Piyush Sethy
Title: Immersive Indian pottery
Review: The store gives an immersive experience to authentic Indian art. When I entered the store, I was warmly welcome by the employees and given an thorough explanation in the intricate processes behind this beautiful pottery. The whole store has an amazing history and it needs to be preserved. Therefore, I will be writing news articles to spread this authentic Indian art.

Name: Seema N
Review: Art is never finished, only abandoned. In Jaipur we really experienced  versatility  in the art form, especially Jaipur blue pottery made us realize that art is beyond over imagination.  Thank you to Mr Anilji for explaining  us the process of manufacturing  blue pottery.

Name: Mrigank G
Title: Best blue pottery shop in Jaipur, Rajasthan
Review: Had an amazing experience at the blue pottery centre. One of the most iconic shops in the city and rajasthan. We came two years back and had forgotten an item at the shop. The owner specially couriered the item to us in Delhi with warm regards for our new marriage. The best blue pottery shop in the country with an owner who has a heart of gold. Thanks!! Will visit again!

Name: Sukanya
Title: Magical and fresh
Review: My favourite part are the plates where hidden pictures we can see. They are so wonderful and amazing

Name: Elodie T
Title: Beautiful art
Review: Beautiful craftsmanship at reasonable prices. The owner and staff were very helpful and knowledgeable. This shop has been around for 45 years and you can see that they know their art. Amazing shop!

Name: NatV
Title: A must visit when in Jaipur
Review: Amazing place! So many wonderful arts and affordable pieces. The owner was really nice to us! Will defo come back!

Name: Harshitha P
Title: Very good experience
Review: A very good experience. I learnt a lot here about blue pottery from Jaipur and had a good experience hearing from the owners.

Name: priyaa v
Title: A must visit experience in Jaipur
Review: Delighted to be here ! The art work and appealing colors are like meditation. Such an unique experience and was so glad to meet Mr.Ashok Sir. He was so thought provoking and spending time understanding his award winning collections was pure bliss. It's a must visit when in Jaipur.

Name: Reshma
Title: Mind blown
Review: It‚Äôs a dream come true for art lovers‚Ä¶ the intricate designs and work is impressive.You would want to buy the entire store ‚Ä¶Beautiful collection and great staff..

Name: ayelet
Title: wonderful
Review: the place is amazing! great art ‚ù§Ô∏è and the people are so nice.we‚Äôve been here hours.they are also looking for workers, who wants to learn this beautiful art, in a lovely place and a relaxing environment.

Name: Katie S
Title: Amazing shopping experience
Review: Great experience, very very good options and variety, affordable prices. My friend had birthday and they gave her some gifts and made us feel so welcome.

Name: Sai Nivarthi
Title: Amazing craft of Jaipur
Review: It was a great experience to explore all the blue pottery of Jaipur in one place. As a cherry on the top, we got to meet Mr. Anil ji who's a definite master of his craft. I'm looking forward to attend his workshop next time I'm in Jaipur.

Name: Darshika R
Title: Must Visit Shop in Jaipur
Review: I Love this shop, the owner will really impress you. He will impress you with his knowledge and teach you about blue pottery. The items available here are super unique and definitely worth the visit. It is must visit in Jaipur.

Name: rashmi p
Title: The dying art needs your attention!!
Review: This is about blue pottery art which is dying. It needs support from govt and students. Students who are interested in arts should learn this art and help it revive. This place has awesome collection of blue pottery and they have their workshop as well.

Name: Sree
Title: Great experience. Must visit.
Review: Had a lovely experience here. Mr. Anil is an amazing artist, and treats all customers with remarkable hospitality. He gave me a token gift and even offered taking a free blue pottery workshop. Was a wonderful encounter and I would love to go back.

Name: Pravitha A
Title: Very good
Review: Nice ambience. People inside there are very nice. I would love to attend their workshop. Main person right now is very famous for his artistry

Name: Eric H
Title: 5 stars, would recommend
Review: Very helpful staff without pressure.  It's a 9th generation shop owned and run by the family.  Beautiful pottery and excellent tea.

Name: Nam Anh T
Title: Learning traditional techniques
Review: Amazing experience learning traditional techniques unique to the family running the shop. The shop also showcases award winning items along with every-day homeward.

Name: Muralidhar
Title: Must visit place in jaipur
Review: It was a good experience , must visit place, fine arts, happy place with good ambiance and try special tea

Name: Sanjeeb Hazarika
Title: Mind blowing
Review: Very beautiful Art form of Jaipur, unique & stuning colour combination still survived in this modern technology world . We all need to extend our help to keep this art form alive

Name: Kashika
Title: Awesome Experience!
Review: Our 8 year daughter Jaishvi Mishra insisted us to see and visit Blue pottery for what Jaipur is famous for. We stepped in the Blue pottery center expecting to see the art and what followed was a unique encounter with Anil Sir - the master artist of Blue pottery .He explained my daughter the intricacies of the art and even welcome her for learning the art. He was happy to learn that our daughter was learning Tabla and gave us many  insights for developing her talent. Even he gifted few Blue pottery work as a token of love and appreciation. We had a truly mesmerizing experience and would like to revisit the centre to learn the art from the God of Art himeself. Thankyou Sir for keeping the art alive! It speaks volumes about our culture and heritage.Very very proud and thankful to you.

Name: Neha
Title: Blue pottery
Review: Lovely to see the work and art by anil ji . He is lovely by nature and passionate for his art .. Do visit this place for a in depth knowledge of the blue pottery art

Name: Suraj KT
Title: Blue pottery
Review: Mr. Anil Doraya is so passionate about his art which was very refreshing to see. Before showing us his work he explained the entire process that goes into making blue pottery. Was a great learning experience and I enjoyed viewing his award winning pieces as well.

Name: Nakul Poonacha
Title: Visit to Blue pottery art
Review: Nayonika The designs and colours of the pottery are very beautiful and interesting.  It's very interesting to learn about how these designs are made and the whole process that leads to these unique pottery designs.

Name: Kaushik M
Title: Wonderful artist and wonderful person to deal with
Review: Anil sir is not only a wonderful artist but also we had a good time talking to him learning about the history of blue pottery.

Name: Emma
Title: Lovely
Review: Beautiful shop and pottery is exquisite. The teacher is very wise and kind. Everyone should visit this shop :)

Name: Keshav Mishra
Title: Jaipur Blue Pottery, Pleasure of meeting Mr. Anil Doraya
Review: It was a pleasure to meet Me. Anil Doraya, President Award Winning artist for blue pottery. He took us to his workshop and showed us the delicate that he and team has done. Amazing person and extraordinary artist. Thanks Sir, humbled to meet you.

Name: Aditya k
Title: Blue pottery!
Review: Absolutely gorgeous place and a wonderful collection of pottery items :) We bought a few pieces for our home, will definitely be back again!

Name: Tobie S
Title: Thanks and gratitudeüòä
Review: This place is so beautiful! Thank you for your beautiful pottery and the keychain for my mother! Blessings to you!

Name: Vidisha
Title: would recommend this to anyone who has an eye for art work. best artist, best artwork. wish they get renowned worldwide.
Review: stumbled upon this amazing pottery workshop in Jaipur, known as Jaipur Blue Pottery Art Centre, and was left completely awestruck. had a wonderful interactive session with Mr.Anil Doraya, not only did he explain about this beautiful artwork, but also gave us hands-on experience.

Name: Reuel
Title: Highly Recommended
Review: Amazing place . Very friendly people. Huge variety of items Loved this placeMust Visit. Highly Recommended

Name: Mabel
Title: Best üëåüèª
Review: The experience was wonderful. There are many beautiful art pieces to buy. Worth it! You can learn a lot of new things, here.

Name: L2143
Title: Original blue pottery
Review: Exelente work and original blue pottery.. must visit place please visit factory.. good products .. worth of buying from here..

Name: Mohammed aslam K
Title: Amazing experience with a talented and truly well recognised Blue Pottery Artist
Review: We had a visit with family to this Blue Pottery Art center and workshop in Aug 2022. Mr. Anil Doraya, the chief Artist of this rarely known handicrafts field is a well recognised and friendly person, explained about his Art. This place vis worth of visit if you are a art and culture lover. You can buy rarely crafted and beautiful items to decorate your home.

Name: Sania
Title: Blue pottery art
Review: This hidden blue pottery store is a hidden gem in the pink city of Jaipur. I had an amazing experience with the owner of the store.

Name: hyacinthalopes
Title: Great collection
Review: The owner is very helpful. Blue pottery collection is very good and we also bought some hand paintings. We have been here multiple times during this visit. Also there are free blue pottery classes organized during the month of June. Do visit if you are in Jaipur...

Name: raghav khanna
Title: Beat blue pottery store in India
Review: Amazing blue pottery collection. I‚Äôm visiting this centre past 20yrs and they have huge collection with wide array of designs and products. Owner is extremely friendly!

Name: Anugraha SN
Title: Blue pottery art centre Jaipur
Review: Wonderful experience. Thoroughly enjoyed watching  the process of blue pottery art. It is a proud moment that Indian craftsmanship is being practiced for generations in Jaipur. It is incredible that Mr. Anil Doraya has been practicing and passing on this tradition on a global. Recommending everyone to visit this Blue art pottery centre. I came across this original beautiful shop from Barkha Jaipur Vlog.

Name: Reeja
Title: Awsome
Review: Must visit place..Very supportive  and helpful staff  and we can learn from them .We must take training from them...

Name: Nadia L
Title: A Cultural & Educational Experience.
Review: Blue Pottery is a dying art that needs revival.Anil is 9th generation pottery maker, and you can tell his love for his art by his words (and prices too). We had the opportunity to take our kids to his factory and he was kind enough to not only show us how it is all made, but with each piece he has on display came learnings of history & culture. It was truly an educational and enlightening experience.

Name: Olaf D
Title: Best choice for a taxi in Jodhpur!
Review: When we planned our stay in Jodhpur, I randomly googled a taxi company to arrange a pick-up at the airport. Later, when it became clear that we would stay in Jodhpur and drive to the wedding in Pali each of the two days, we got in contact again and arranged also those trips. As we had to buy some local dresses for a wedding, our driver was also available to pick us up at the hotel and organize all the places we wanted to go to. We expected a taxi, what we finally got, was a very motivated and friendly driver who did not only drove us around, but a go-to person that took care of all the small things and questions we had as India newbies. I warmly recommend the company and especially the driver Digvijay. So, when you are in this area and need transportation plus perfect service around in Jodhpur, Rajasthan get in touch with this company.

Name: Vikas P
Title: Jaipur to Delhi travel
Review: Had an excellent experience with the ride I took with family. The driver Firoz was professional, the car was clean and comfortable, and the ride was smooth and efficient. Highly recommend!

Name: Anurag T
Title: Very nice
Review: Rajputana cabs provide a good Innova crysta and a very good driver Mr Varinder Singh. He was very flexible with the time and places for sightseeing and was also knowledgeable about local traffic situations that helped us plan better. Ms Divya from their sales team was helpful. I paid extra amount by mistake and Mr Tarun from their transport team immediately refunded back Overall good experience.

Name: Ravneet singh
Title: Wonderful
Review: We had a wonderful experience with rajpurtana cabs. Specially the guy RAGHUVEER SINGH who dealt with us so politely and patiently.

Name: utkarsh m
Title: Jodhpur to Jaisamer taxi ride
Review: Driver was very polite and friendly. He came on time and even waited for 45 mins very politlely while we came down. The pricing was also very reasonable.

Name: Francisco Garcia
Title: Excellent.
Review: Very good service from Delhi to Agra, we were at all times safe and comfortable! The driver was amazing.

Name: eztravel394
Title: Poor experience
Review: We took two trips. One was a 5 day multi-city trip and another was a one way drop. If we had only taken the first trip my rating would have been 2-2.5 stars.Pros:+ They are one of the few cab companies who responded when we asked for a quote 2 weeks before travel during peak season. + They are not the lowest priced (some aggregators beat them) but they were somewhere close to the lowest quotesCons- Terrible response after you pay the advance. For Trip 1 they asked me to call back 2 days back. After multiple calls/whatsapp the driver contacted me the previous day evening. For Trip 2, the driver called me 1 hour before and I was relying on this service to drop me at Delhi airport to catch a plane!- Cars that were assigned were bad. The cat assigned to the first trip was bad. The one assigned for the second trip was terrible. It has more than 250000 kms broken rearview mirrors and severely dented back. It was stinking of cigarette smoke. - Drivers weren't very professional. Issues included  sending whatsapp messages while driving, giving excuses to take the car inside busy parts (driver asked us to go by auto), etc. Summary: If you want something on the cheaper side Rajputana cabs is an option, but you may find other aggregators. If you are looking for good service, clean cars and professional drivers look elsewhere.

Name: Nivedita A
Title: Shimla-Manali trip
Review: Our cab driver Pawan ensured we had a very comfortable journey - he was very knowledgable with the sightseeing hotspots and navigated hill driving very well. He played a vital role in ensuring our holiday experience was a memorable one.

Name: Mkhan
Title: Dodgy behaviour for a top rated cab company
Review: Dealing with a highly rated cab shouldn't come with hassles.. My cab was assigned by a Dashrath Godara.. It was not a licensed taxi but a private car. The driver told us to say this was my brother's car in case the cops stop us. The driver was not very confident and even lost his way on the way to Jodhpur.Towards the end of the trip it turned out that Dashrath had provided the wrong drop date for the tour and the driver insisted that we were to end the tour a day early..this was despite my having confirmed the dates on chat (screenshot attached).Dashrath said he'd provide us the drop the next day but he didn't, instead asking us to get a taxi from the hotel and reimbursing it. Following up with Dashrath for the reimbursement has been met with radio silence.Overall, i would not recommend them at all and would say it's better to go via a trusted Travel agency or aggregator.

Name: Isaac
Title: Superb experience
Review: The car was arranged in advance, and we even got a better car than expected. The Driver Lal Singh was also very friendly and provided a smooth experience. Highly recommended

Name: Sanjay Ray
Title: Awasome experience
Review: It's a great experience in Rajasthan tour ..24 th to 29 th Dec 2022.The service of "Rajputana cab "was just mind-blowing. Spacially the response of CB sing is awesome.any time any where he always guide us.it was very good experience with our driver come guide brother Tejpal..he is very gentle,caring and lovely person.overall very good experience with Rajputana cab.. thank you Rajputana cab for providing us this kind of service..

Name: Rahul D
Title: Wonderful experience
Review: Quick cab service provider. Stick to his commitment in peak time as well. There were no cabs available during Christmas season but Rasputin cabs managed the show well.

Name: Globe_trotter_20221
Title: Excellent service!
Review: We booked cars through Rajputana cabs almost on a daily basis during our trip to Jaipur recently.Mr. CB Singh organised the bookings smoothly for us. The drivers were always very polite and punctual. The service charges were also very fair!We had a trip to Agra organised by some friends. On the day of departure, we were informed at 6am that the program had been scrapped. We were left to organise our own transport and had big bags to compound the problem.I called Mr. Singh at 8am and requested a last minute booking for the trip. He managed to organise the same very quickly. We had a car at the hotel at 10:30am, as desired! The driver was very polite and the car (Toyota Innova) was excellent! The entire trip was very pleasant!I'd like to thank Mr. Singh for his services and also make a special mention for the last minute rescue for Agra trip!I will be using his services for all future trips, as well as advising family and friends too!

Name: Dustsettler
Title: Irresponsible and unsafe
Review: They will lure you in with cheap prices, contract your trip out to 3rd party and not take any responsibility for anything that happens on the trip. They squeeze both the customers and the contractors hard to make money. Avoid and rather pay more for a more responsible and safe operator

Name: Simon33715
Title: Excellent, professional taxi and guide service
Review: We arranged a 9-day tour around Rajasthan with Rajputana Cabs (run by Mr Singh and Mr Singh), with a car collecting us at the airport in Udaipur and taking us to Jodhpur, Jaipur and Agra (UP), ending with our departure from Agra airport. The days not travelling were used for sightseeing and, for each destination, Rajputana provided professional guides for the sightseeing days, each of whom was excellent, and that worked extremely well.  The car, a Toyota Innova Crysta, was large and comfortable and our driver, Peekay, was very competent, professional, punctual and friendly, his skills being very important with some of the road situations one encounters on that route.  This all meant we had a fantastic time.  If there were room for one slight improvement, it is that the Mr Singhs are men of few words, which led to a bit of unnecessary confusion on a couple of occasions, but did not adversely affect the overall service in any significant way. Without hesitation, I would thoroughly recommend using this company.

Name: Deepak Patel
Title: Clean and neat car with excellent drivers
Review: Very Neat and clean cars. Driver are very cordial and on time. I strongly recommend you to take their services for Delhi Jaipur or other places . Thank you for making our trip super comfortable..

Name: Ashish Chaturvedi
Title: Very good and enjoyable trip
Review: We went to a trip from Jaipur to Alwar we had a awesome trip. The tempo traveler provided by Rajputana cabs is very good and driver behavior is also very good. At the last I can say that I fully recommend you all to choose rajputana cabs for trip.

Name: Mrunali Ghorpade
Title: Good service and Affordable rates
Review: We booked a cab from rajputana Cab services.The journey and cab service was up to the mark. Price was affordable.We didn't had any complaints with driver, He gave us alot of information about the city and it was good experience.

Name: Neeraj
Title: Misguided information over cab timing
Review: I was interested to go to chowki dhani and decided to hire vehicle. At the time of booking, the personnel said that chowki dhani timing is from 5-11 pm and taxi will be available for us till we intend to stay in chowki dhani. I make partial payment of Rs 500/- as Booking charge . The vehicle came at about 5.30 and since i was travelling with kids, we got late and started our journey. Surprisingly, the driver told the moment we sat in vehicle that we can spend only 2 1/2 hr only in chowki dhani and 1/2 hr can be added further. We reached at 7 pm and driver keep calling us at 10 to come out. Really frustrating. Definitely not up to mark . They say they are govt registered but need to review their staff behaviour and false commitments.

Name: vaibhav s
Title: It was very good
Review: We find one other best and professional cabs service in jaipur,car provided were nice and clean nature of the driver was very friendly and rates for the cars are very reasonable.

Name: S Sethia
Title: good experience
Review: Was a good experience. The driver was nice and drove well without any glitches in the journey. There are hidden toll taxes but he warned me before hand. They can also sleep overnight in the car if needed. The experience in booking was also smooth.

Name: Manoj Kumar
Title: Amazing and satisfied Experience
Review: We were a group of four adults and a 3 year old kid. The Vehicle we booked was Innova but alloted vehicle was Hyundai Alcazar.Ms Divya Singh helped us to book the car hassle free and enquired through out our trip for any help or assistance.She was very helpful and time-bound for giving the quotes and queries.The car was very nice and brand new.The driver Azad Singh was also very gentle and helpful.Our 13 days trip was a memorable one.Appreciating your efforts.I personally recommend your firm to our friends and colleagues and will definitely meet for our future trips.Manoj Kumar M

Name: Adil D
Title: Rajputana cabs review
Review: This is my second trip with Rajputana cabs. This time travelled with them to delhi-agra-mathura-vrindavan and back. It was a pleasant experience. coordinator Bhavana managed things with ease ensuring that the trip went smooth. Thanks for the good service.

Name: Bidisha D
Title: Good travel experience
Review: The cab arrived at the exact time. The driver too was polite and professional. Highly recommend and will definitely travel again with Rajputana.

Name: Satya
Title: Awesome experience
Review: The booking was easy, they were flexible about no advance requirements. The driver was very friendly and professional. Was flexible both ways while traveling from Delhi to jaipur and after few weeks back. Response time was good. Overall it‚Äôs a thumbs up üëçüèª

Name: Srikanth Adhyatmabhattar
Title: Excellent service
Review: We booked a taxi Swift desire on 8th November 2022. Driver Sultan Singh was alloted to us by C.B Singh (owner of Rajputana cabs). He was on time during our pickup from the hotel where we were staying. He also gave a brief overview about each sightseeing we visited which helped us a lot and suggested to visit places which were not in our itinerary. In short very good service.

Name: donald
Title: Cab
Review: The booking was simple process and value for money. Roop Singh picked us from airport worked as guide and driver . His driving skills are good and smooth

Name: srirammiyer
Title: Visit to Jaipur
Review: I was exploring cabs for Jaipur city tours and Pushkar and came across Rajputana Cabs through Google. I called them and they gave me a good package for my tour. The best part is they give you a complete package inclusive of parking and toll charges which I did not find in others cabs  companies with whom I had enquired. One the day of arrival they sent me a Toyota Etios (me and my mother were travelling). Our driver Roop Singh was very courteous. He showed us all the places and also guided us throughout the 4 days . He also advised us where to take guide and where not too as at some places tour guides were not required. He also took us to the shopping places which were the local shopping places and we got good stuffs. Overall Roop Singh was a great help to us in guiding us over the tour. I recommend Rajputana cabs for your tours in Jaipur

Name: Priya
Title: Best service
Review: Best service ,on time, driver was very cool, calm & polite. Very friendly. Prices are also genuine. Driver,. Driving skills was very üëç

Name: RGathani
Title: Unreliable agency - Backs out from agreed prices and car type at the last moment!!
Review: Had pre booked a cab with deposit for four people with luggage from Jaisalmer to Jodhpur.They sub contracted to some local vendor. The local guy demanded higher price then the pre agreed one !!! Had to escalate the issue and waste time to resolve it while on trip. They then sent a car with inadequate trunk space. Inspite of sharing pics they did not accept their mistake neither did they refund deposit money. Had to book another another cab - luckily got one else would have missed my train. Pathetic experience

Name: N B
Title: Excellent
Review: Mr. Bhanwar was an excellent & knowledgeable driver! Condition of the cab was very good! Thank you for your service & help!

Name: Sagun Joshi
Title: Excellent guide cum tour
Review: Excellent service. I had booked luxury car for Jaipur tour about a week before. Since then they are in contact regularly. We had very limited time in Jaipur to visit and journey began early in the morning at 4:45 AM. The car was already in the station before we reach. In 2.5 hour tour he showed us entire Jaipur. Our driver was Dilip Singh. He is so professional, he not only show us Jaipur but told us the entire history. I strongly recommend this cab service to anyone. And , BTW, I also noticed same name being used by others in some site. So be careful to select the original one for genuine service.

Name: Paresh Saxena
Title: Trustworthy Service!
Review: Clean cars, and service you can trust! Prices were better than most places that I searched. Driver on the way back from ranthambore to Jaipur airport was driving like he‚Äôs driving an ATV on a bumpy road. I was bouncing all over the place in the backseat!

Name: Giuseppe V
Title: Trustful and fast
Review: The communication/booking was supper easy, the driver was on time, car was comfortable, highly recommended, great service!!

Name: Subramanian R
Title: Very satisfied.
Review: Nice coordination by Ms Divya and has very well organised our trip frm Chandigarh to Ludhiana and Delhi -Mathura-delhi sector.Drivers were very supportive too.

Name: sanricksan
Title: Best Commuters in RJ
Review: Mostly new set of cars and the drivers are gentle. Long journeys can be comfortable with Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Anushka
Title: Great service! Highly professional. Smooth driving. ArvindJi is great and has serval good stories to narrate.
Review: Great service! Highly professional. Smooth driving. ArvindJi is great and has serval good stories to narrate.

Name: Rohit R
Title: Excellent service
Review: Highly recommend their service. Have booked multiple Rajasthan tours with Rajputana cabs and can vouch for their excellent service, especially Mr Dashrath.

Name: Brijendra Singh
Title: Very Professional & Polite
Review: The cars are neat clean and drivers are very polite. Very upright, professional and reliable services. The final bill I had was within the original estimate. Most recommended if traveling with family.

Name: Akansha gupta
Title: What a trip  !!!!
Review: It was are best trip...and Inderpal uncle was was humble nd he was take our care like parent...he guided us in a best way...and for other trips also..we will contact them...tarun and bhawna maam thanku...

Name: Utkarsh gupta
Title: Best manali trip
Review: Loved the experience. Our driver bhaiya was really amazing , he is quite knowledgeable, polite and took a really good care of us. I will recommend to all my friends and family members.

Name: fabrice c
Title: Trip between Jodhpur and Jaisalmer
Review: Booked two trips one from Jodhpur to Jaisalmer and another one on return. Trips were ok and drivers as well. Globally good even if on return, driver had difficulties to reach hotel.

Name: Arun.S
Title: Good experience on our Rajasthan trip
Review: We hired a cab from Rajputana Cabs for our 8N/9D family (2 adults and 2 kids) holiday tour of Rajasthan with the following itinerary - Airport (Jodhpur) -> Jaisalmer -> Jodhpur -> Udaipur -> Jaipur -> Jaipur Airport.We had a single driver (Jodhraj ji) and cab from start to finish. The service offered was excellent. We were driven around for both inter-city travel and within the city site-seeing. The driver was always on time for picking us up and was also very knowledgeable about the sightseeing places guiding us where/what to see. All through the 9 days the family felt very comfortable with the driver and did not have any issues.Overall I would recommend Jodhraj as a driver for anyone visiting Rajasthan through Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Kansara
Title: Jaipur
Review: Very good service, very good driver,. If you are in Rajasthan Rajputana travel is one of the best option

Name: Soni Jose
Title: What a tragedy
Review: Booked cab for Shimla visit with exact hotel name and itinerary and paid 500 Rs as advance as requestedWhen requested for driver number, they can share it only evening before the travel date and agreedAnd number was shared evening by 8'O clockBut when contacted driver to share the hotel details for pick up, he was confused and requested to contact RajputanaSo again called the lady in charge and the reply was hotel is not in the location as they expected, should charge Rs 2000 more and agreed to refund if no service required. I was travelling with family of 3 kids and no choice to reject , so agreed with half heart under standing they were cheating as all the details were shared when cab was booked. I was not convinced that they will send the taxi, so some how managed another  taxi as it was almost 10'O clock evening. They refused to pay back advance saying they arranged  another taxi.

Name: Bhumika V
Title: Clean tempo traveller and a great driver.
Review: We had booked a tempo traveller for 8 people all senior citizens, they were all happy with the 4 day journey. Had a great experience. Thank you Rajputana cabs.

Name: V Nambiar
Title: Jaipur trip
Review: 5 star service from Rajputana cabs.... we had a very good experience.   Thanks to driver Bablu ...  Was a great trip üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

Name: Umesh Dubey
Title: Amazing trip....
Review: I recently booked round trip from Jaipur to Khatushyamji.Excellent customer service...Car condition was good and driver behaviour also good. Thank you...

Name: Raja.p
Title: Never recommended
Review: Overall experience was bad..not proper service..Never recommended..Condition of car not good , ac not working..

Name: Kamal verma
Title: Service beyond expectations
Review: Service beyond the expectations. Very good service. Our cab driver Mr. Ravi is very responsible. When my daughter missed her bus from banasthali to jaipur he helped her too much to reach jaipur to catch next bus on time with full responsibility.Thanks a lot Rajputana cab and Mr. Ravi

Name: Sam S
Title: The Taxi was the key to our amazing trip
Review: Amazing week in Jaipur was made possible by Rajputana Taxi. Rajkumar was an amazing driver and found us an excellent Tour Guide for our trip. The car was excellent and comfortable. He took us to visit his family and also drove us to Agra and Dehli. Amazing time - thank you

Name: KIRTI
Title: Excellent services
Review: Best experience with Bhupendra ji from rajputana cabs.. he gave every small details about heritage culture.. well spent day

Name: Heena T
Title: Best service ü§ó
Review: Excellent service by Mr. Bhupendra Singh ji....he is  professional and gave necessary guidance for your travel needs. He even direct the nicest restaurants.

Name: Yateesh
Title: Honest, humble, prompt and excellent service
Review: Finally a cab service that actually is not out to fleece folks. Mr. Dilip Singh is an awesome guy. He owns the service and is so very humble. He couldn't find a driver to take us to the airport. So he drove us personally. You can see he genuinely wants to help folks. His pricing is very reasonable. Too bad we discovered him on our way out of jaipur. But hopefully of we visit any other part of rajasthan in the future, we will definitely call Dilip.

Name: Mayank Rawat
Title: Great Experience
Review: We had a great weekend with Mr.Ajay .The best person in town to go out and have trip. He was very friendly and polite and told many things what to do and which will be the best time to go for which place . I hope to see him next time as well .Thank you Rajputana cab for his service .

Name: Nitesh Goyal
Title: Thanks to Rajputana Cabs for their reliable service!
Review: A huge thank you to Mr.CB Singh for arranging for cabs for our local travel in Jaipur. During our visit,  mobile internet was shut off by the government, due to which life was obviously quite difficult, but the drivers provided by Mr. Singh were top quality, and knew their way around the city well. Highly recommended!A special shoutout to our driver, Mr. Sultan Singh for his hospitality.

Name: Hina
Title: Rajputana cabs
Review: Rajputana cabsMr. Bhupendra singh helps us to with perfact suggestions and good locations.Thanks to Rajputana.

Name: Fenyshah
Title: Mr. Bhupendra Singh
Review: Excellent service by Mr. Bhupendra Singh from Rajputana cabs and he helps us with very good suggestions.

Name: Khilna Haria
Title: Highly Recommend
Review: Highly Recommend.......Excellent service and even the driver was very cooperative and he made sure we didn't miss any of our sightseeing.

Name: Satya
Title: Family friendly and flexible - great experience
Review: We travelled this month from Delhi to Jaipur and was a great experience. I booked it for 11:30 pick up at Delhi international airport. A day before, the flight got rescheduled. Informed the cab company and they said no worries driver will pick u at 4 pm rescheduled time, which he didWas very friendly to stop for any small family need purchases as needed like water snacks or bio breaks and to not stop even though there were key milestone stops if asked not to stop (my kids were sleeping)Was able to drive safely and within 5 hours or so to JaipurThey even gave additional discount Recommended ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Name: Azeemaimran
Title: Had a great trip
Review: Had a great trip with them. The driver was polite. They charged only what they told told. Nothing extra was charged. The price was nominal. Really thank you.

Name: Sandip Patel
Title: So happy !! üôÇ
Review: We have got a very nice facility. The driver and the car were very nice. We are happy with their service and will be re-booking from here and will suggest others to book from here as well. Ms. Divya ma'am  so supportive and kind for booking. we are  very great full with their services.

Name: Adil D
Title: Good experience with relatively competative price. The coordination Divya was able to setup everything quite well. Drive
Review: Good experience with relatively competative price. The coordination Divya was able to setup everything quite well. Driver too were friendly and cooperative

Name: Samir Pandey
Title: Char dham trip
Review: I experienced professionalism in dealing with them. Their arrangements in terms of quality and worth are appreciating. Quite satisfied with coordination of Ms. Divya.

Name: Karmrajsinh
Title: Awesome Journey with Sandeep Singh
Review: It was a great and safe journey with family. Very co-operative team of Rajputana Cabs. It was a nice experienced

Name: Prateek
Title: Excellent CABS
Review: Car was clean and comfortable  with excellent driver . Driver was on time . Reached destination on time

Name: Shailendra Baghel
Title: Excellent service and good driver.
Review: We took the services of Rajputana cabs from Chandigarh to Manali and back in a 5 days tour. Highly recommended. 5 star experience. Driver named as "Lucky" from Ludiana was quite friendly . He was familiar with all places in & around Manali.I will definitely use your service again. Your service, and reliability, made a long stressful journey end positively. Driver was punctual.Driver got in touch really early to make arrangements of where and when would be best to meet us , and then stayed in touch with us throughout our trip.Lucky was friendly.Would highly recommend the service to anyone.

Name: hemant kumar meena
Title: Upender Singh cab driver
Review: Upender Singh driver of rajputana cabs has excellent knowledge of rajasthan history. Very good cab driver friendly and hospitable as well.

Name: sahayj29
Title: Excellent service, good car and driver.
Review: Had booked a Crysta for one way from Jaipur to Jodhpur on 28th April 2022. They sent a nearly new vehicle so we had a comfortable and cool journey. The driver was superb and guided us during visit to Ajmer en route.

Name: Subir R
Title: Simply Great.
Review: Well behaved , punctual drivers, very efficient office staffs, always available at your service. Very clear communication and never missed commitment.

Name: GK Rao
Title: Excellent Service
Review: Excellent service by Rajputana Cabs, Mr. CB Singh and Hemanth Kumar. They took good care of the tour plan as per schedule and guided us properly. Thanks to Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Manav S
Title: Jaipur journey
Review: Excellent service by bhupender singh. He very good knowledge of history of Rajasthan. We enjoyed jaipur journey with him. He is so kind and good at explaining historical places of Rajasthan

Name: Basant
Title: Manali Experience
Review: Booking experience was smooth. Driver was timely available each day and was fully aware of the local places to visit. The standard trip duration however can be shortened from 3 days to 2 days.

Name: Vadloori Karthik Babu
Title: Good and memorable experience
Review: Glad to have chosen this service. The driver was timely and professional. But we faced a little arrogant behaviour from the same. Do groom your drivers on that aspect and everything else is fantastic.

Name: YASHAWANT SANE
Title: Very efficient and prompt service
Review: Ms.Hina Chaudhary (Rajputana cabs) was cooperative for booking  driver Mr.Raju Rai was good decipline driver

Name: muzir
Title: Good

Name: Swati k
Title: Excellent service by Bhupendra singh from Rajputana cabs
Review: Excellent service by Bhupendra singh from Rajputana cabs. He came on time and explained many things about jaipur while on the cab. Had a relaxed and great time due to him in jaipur.)

Name: prateekdoppleganger
Title: Great services. Good and generous drivers.
Review: Driver Ravinder Singh Shekhawat is a very well behaved and good driver. Rajputana Cabs provides excellent service all over Rajasthan. Everytime I visit Rajasthan i hire their cabs. From Jodhpur,Jaisalmer,Udaipur,Chittorgarh,Bikaner,Mount Abu,Jaipur i have always trusted them. During my Jodhpur Jaisalmer Longewala trip Driver Chhatar Singh was also very well behaved and generous.

Name: Ramiz
Title: Excellent
Review: They gave us great experiences. Mr Bhupinder , our cab driver, was very honest man. He gave us many historical information prior to our guide. He indeed is talented. He helped us when we lost our phone. Fortunately we got the phone back. He is simple. He is a down to earth man and jovial. I will recommend if anyone is hiring rajputana cabs in jaipur for sight seeing, they should take Mr Bhupinder.

Name: Dhawal Grover
Title: Excellent serviceMr. Bhupendra SinghRajputana cabs Excellent knowledge about historical period and he is of very polite nature H
Review: Excellent serviceMr. Bhupendra SinghRajputana cabs Excellent knowledge about historical period and he is of very polite nature Had a great time with Mr. Bhupendra Singh

Name: Deep D
Title: Rajputana cabs excellent service by Mr Bhupendra singh
Review: An excellent trip in jaipur which was kindly elaborated by Mr.Bhupendar singh who was very kind and generous. He got a nice knowlegde about historical monuments and forts in jaipur. Got good history skills. Had a great time with him anyone can recommend him for their tour.

Name: Shrabanti
Title: Excellent Trip
Review: Excellent Trip.. Mr Bhupendra Singh. Rajputana CabBhupendra ji is a very reliable person and also knowledgeable person if you want to know about Rajasthan. He is a nice person. If you want to take Rajputana Cab for Jaipur sightseeing please take Bhupendra ji as a driver. the rate is also minimal.

Name: ranjita g
Title: Baraat Car
Review: I booked car ( Audi A4) for my brother‚Äôs wedding in Jan22. The whole experience was very professional and seamless. Car arrived on time and was very clean. Driver was very helpful and accomodating to our needs during the wedding.

Name: Vinay
Title: Best experience. Definitely recommended
Review: We had hired Rajputana CAB service for 13 days. Trip includes sightseeing of Jaipur, Bikaner, Jaisalmer, Jodhpur and Udaipur cities. Our CAB driver NAVARATAN SIGH RAJAVAT was very helpful, punctual and explained us most of the things we should know as first time visitors. Also he was very professional and well behaved. CAB(Swift Desire) was also very neat and clean.Rajputana CAB service representative HEENA guided us for planning the entire trip. She was in touch with us for continues feedback.It was a very good experience with Rajputana CAB and happy with service. Definitely recommended.

Name: Papu B
Title: Trust them they're good and professional
Review: Overall it's a good experience, most of the process is online and professionally managed, hence i don't face any problem in availing the service. Ms Hina assisted me during the entire process and Mr. Ram sing our driver was a gem.

Name: mehul kabrawala
Title: Rajputana cab is really Rajputana üëå
Review: Very good & Very safe Cab Service. Car is in very good condition.  Most important they provides me well behaved & knowledgeable driver. Thank you Rajputana Cabs & special thanks to medam hina chaudhary for making my trip memorable.üëç

Name: Sonali Korgaonkar
Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service, From pickup to boarding from Jaipur to selected place. Making your journey memorable. Service by Bhupendra Singh. Great tourist guide & down to earth nature. Really thankful for your service üòÅüëå.

Name: Pooja M
Title: Excellent
Review: Excellent love the network, speed of arrangement & quality of service! Only people to book with in Rajasthan!

Name: Shreya Dhole
Title: Reasonable and Reliable Cab service
Review: It was a very wonderful experience to travel with Rajputana  Cabs.In 2020 we traveled to Pushkar,Ajmer,Kumbhalgarh,Ranakpur and Jodhpur with Rajputana with senior citizen,the drivers are very polite ad go out of the way to make your journey a memorable one!Last week we were travelling to Kishangarh and Ajmer from Jaipur on a all girls trip,it was an impromptu plan,they provided the cab on a short notice and this time again the we had a pleasant experience.They drive very smoothly and also inform you about the history of the place and also about the local food you should try.Coming to prices,its very reasonable as compared to other taxi services,trust me we had contacted a lot.So definitely go for Rajputana Taxi Service.

Name: PC
Title: Fabulous Trip
Review: Took a local cab service for exploring manikaran kasol from Miss Anjali Singh.it was a memorable day. driver was awesome well planned tour. Big thanks to Anjali Singh and her team.

Name: lucky
Title: Good and great Service with reasonable price
Review: The service was arranged by Anjali on a short notice and we were very happy with the service provided, we would recommend to our friends about Rajputanaa Cabs.Driver was very friendly and nice to us...Keep doing good..Much appreciate the service which was provided to us on short notice on New year peak time, with reasonable price.

Name: megha r
Title: Terrible
Review: We booked a taxi with rajputana cabs in jaisalmer with a drop to jodhpur.We spend almost 4 days with this taxi operator. It was one of the most horrible experience we had, I asked for a sedan but they gave an innova saying they didn;t have a sedan due to peak season and i  agreed for the innova with X amount, which was a bit high , i agreed as i was travelling with my mother in law and daughter. When we reached jaisalmer we were welcomed with 2 Dezires mentioning that their innova met with an accident , once we reached jaislamer town we were forced into one car , i was assured that from the next day innova will be ready. Come the second day there came a ETIOS that too late by more than an hour the driver had some excuses when i asked about innova a new story was given to me and i spoke with their representative via phone who was telling some other reason .The driver all through the journey mentioned that they will not be able to provide innova for the local tours and will provide one during our return to jopdhpur.The driver was mostly on phone and was mostly interested in commissions he gets and was asking for bills from where we shopped...etc...Come the third day a Dezire came that too late by 90 mins gave some lame reasons.Yes more thing i had to pay tolls and parking charges but these guys told that they rates are inclusive.Come the fourth day ETIOS came that too a bad vehicle and once again late by 120 mins.This impacted our program in jodhpur as we reached jodhpur late .Finally when it came to settlement he was asking 2k on top of what was asked for innova, i had to fight with the person and settled for a lesser amount.I was messaging and speaking to him multiple times all through the 4 days and everytime he was only telling lies.Very bad service , pathetic cars , unprofessional service and over priced.Better avoid this cab service as they seem to tell only lies and extremely unprofessional.

Name: Arpita M
Title: Highly recommend
Review: Our experience with Rajputana cabs was awesome. Anjali mam was always available for any questions and she assured us about best service. Driver was very polite ans cooperative and very professional. Thank you for making our trip successful and taking memories back home . Thanks Anjli Singh, driver Bittu and driver Sukhvinder Singh.

Name: Sshhiivvaanniiii
Title: Rajputana cabs
Review: Service of Rajputana Cabs was very nice. They cooperated very well. Our trip was arranged very well without any trouble. Driver was linent. Zoya mam cooperated and responded on time and her service was good.

Name: Manish S
Title: Great service
Review: Great experience overall. Drivers are helpful and very courteous. Timely pickup and drop. Highly recommend overall.

Name: Akshay
Title: Jaipur-Udaipur-Ranthambore trip
Review: Our journey was very good. Driver was excellent took us to all the beat places. Felt safe travelling with him.

Name: pujaa
Title: Airport Tranfer
Review: I came across this cab service on Google. I wanted a clean sanitized big car with vaccinated driver for tranfer to the Indira Gandhi International Airport as I wS traveling with my family. Miss Zoya helped with best choice of car available at 3 am in the morning. The price were very competitive with personal service. The driver came before time and was very polite. I would definitely chose there service again.

Name: Eswar
Title: Jaipur one day sightseeing tour
Review: Had a good experience with the service.Driver Sultan singh was good. Was able to recommend good places and cab was well maintained, hygiene. Highly recommended.

Name: Aqip
Title: Good
Review: Thank you zoya for giving me a save and a best service. Excellent service by herAnd A great thanks to her driver Mukesh

Name: Farzana G
Title: One of the best Jaipur car rental company
Review: Sultan was our guide and driver for the 3 days. He is a very knowledgeable and friendly guy. While we had a draft itinerary to see multiple things, Sultan suggested we make minor changes to it so that we could see all the places of interest without getting too exhausting. Overall er spent a good 3 nights at Jaipur and Sultan made it extra special for us.

Name: Shivangi
Title: Recommended
Review: Professional polite drivers and a car in good condition. Travel from Delhi to Jaipur was pleasant. Recommend hiring them

Name: Chetan Shinde
Title: Very Excellent Cars
Review: Very good cars & excellent service. Enjoyed the Jaipur trip due to Dream Car Jaipur.  Highly recommended.

Name: ABDUL HAQ MUJAHID. K

Review: Best best cab vinod kumar bhaiya also so gud in Nature and. Like a family members thanks for memorable trip

Title: Best
Review: Perfect cab service for all time. I‚Äôve booked from jaipur to delhi. Things were very good with me. Driver was professional

Name: Suryan
Title: Nice cab services we got in Jaipur!

Name: Kiran
Title: Highly recommended
Review: I took one day trip to Pushker from Jaipur. Driver was really professional and cab was very clean. Had great experience

Name: Rahul Goyal
Title: Great experience
Review: I got to know about Dream cab through internet. After all the great reviews we booked their service for 11 days Rajasthan tour. Our cab driver Mr Brijwashi took great care of us and we had a great time visiting Jaipur -> Mandwa -> Bikaner -> Jaisalmer -> Longewala -> Jodhpur -> Udaipur -> Chittorgarh. I would recommend everyone to consider Dream cab as they are very professional, economical and punctual. They delivered on all the promised services. Kudos to the team. keep the good service up.

Name: Ritesh
Title: Trip to Jaipur and Ranthambore
Review: Really polite and humble person. Great experience to travel with Mahendraji‚Äôs cab. We went for a 5 day trip to Jaipur & Ranthambore, Mr. Nareshji who was our driver with 18 years of experience helped us cover each of the places.Thank you for the great services.

Name: Gaurangi Divekar
Title: Recommend to make your travel bookings through them.

Our driver Naresh was good at maintaining safety aspects and helped us in suggestions for tourist places also. They provided a good guide to take us through the monuments in Jaipur. The customer service is really good.

Name: Prateek Kalangan
Title: Enjoyable trip
Review: Best cab service in Rajasthan. Well guided tour by Mr. Vinod. Punctual and professional. Definitely recommend it!

Name: Komal
Title: Good CAB service
Review: I would like to thank Mahendra Ji for providing good cab service. The driver Naresh was equally cooperative and well behaved. I would like to take his service again.Thank You for the service.

Name: Rakesh
Title: Best cab service provider in rajasthanHaving maintained neat and clean cabs provides good services and very secured ser
Review: Very good and professional cab service. Espicially Mr Vinod Sharma took very good care of us. Was very helpful and gave good info about the city. Will definitely book again in my next trip.

Name: Ninad
Title: Great car quality and driver
Review: Brand new car was provided. Car and service was first class. Driver Radhe Shyam was very polite, patient and punctual. The restaurants and tourist places suggested by driver were great.

Name: mashukhasan joy
Title: Dream cab Very reliable cab company.
Review: Experience and new car. Mr tanwar is a very professional and very polite person. He gave us a great service. He helped us lot. Next time when we will come to Jaipur I will contact with Mr tanwar and will take service from him.

Name: Kiran Dhoot
Title: Excellent
Review: Driver is very helpful,  very nice  service. From booking to drop. Very humble .he knows city very well.

Name: Losh P
Title: Happy customers
Review: We had a fantastic trip through Rajasthan from 4-17 January. Our driver Naresh, was friendly and professional and above all an excellent driver though some tough conditions. We always felt safe and well looked after.The car was clean and in good condition. Overall very happy with this service. Will definite again when visiting India.

Name: Abhishek P
Title: Good and reliable cab service
Review: Very good and professional cab service. Espicially Mr Naresh Sen took very good care of us. Was very helpful and gave good info about the city. Will definitely book again in my next trip.

Name: dilanshichauhan
Title: Memorable
Review: The driver was very helpful and thorough professional. He was guiding us through out the trip. Thank you so much.

Name: Madhavi S
Title: Safe and comfortable travel
Review: Excellent experience. The driver, Vinod Kumar was with us for six days. He took us to all the sightseeing places as well as off-beat places in Sanganer to look at block print untis and a Jaipur pottery workshop. He also took us to Ranthambore for two days.It will, however help to also hire a guide to help plan your itinerary.The vehicle was clean and working well. Vinod Kumar was also very punctual and managed to make difficult trips in the extremely foggy conditions on the trip to and from Ranthambore.Overall, we had a safe and comfortable travel, which is what we had requested.

Name: Pratish R
Title: Great journey in Jaipur
Review: Our driver Mr Tanwar Singh was excellent and helped us with a smooth drive and shared a lot of interesting points about Jaipur through the journey.

Title: Excellent Experience

He made them very comfortable to travel. One interesting part with him were before we go to the spot he get to know all details about the spot and explains us during travel. So we were able to know about the location very clearly before we reach the location. Our 10 days trip was very fruitful so that we were able to know lot of information about Rajasthan. Great work Sunil. We wish to travel with you again.

Name: Samarth Shah
Title: Best cab service in Jaipur with Om Prakash Ji

Showed us many places and also explained the story behind. Driver name is Sunil and he was very helpful. My trip was with my family and had my mother who is 70 and my son who was 6. He made sure that they were comfortable as well. I would highly recommend Sunil and dream cabs.

Title: Great experience

Extremely competent, able to adjust to our varying requests and knowledgable of the different areas we visited.

No unnecessary calls while waiting for you after they have dropped you some place. You can take your own time. Also they do not charge one extra penny than what is decided before you book their services!! Highly recommended.

Title: Well Mannered Driver & Clean Taxi
Review: Our trip was to Jaipur & Agra. Our driver was Om Prakash.The car that we got was neat and clean. The driver was courteous.On my request they arranged for government-approved tourist guides at both locations.Mr Sanjay at Jaipur and Mr Bhupendra at Agra.Both were knowledgeable about their respective cities and the attractions they showed us. Mr Bhupendra went out of his way to help us in shopping at Agra.All the guides and drivers waited very patiently at all the destinations/ hotels/ restaurants that we went too.I will recommend their service for anyone that wants a cab from Jaiour.

Name: Abhiram
Title: Dream taxi service review
Review: Great experience. Car in great condition. Driver knows all internal routes very well. Highly recommend their service.

Name: Mohan Gupta
Title: Highly recommended
Review: I booked a day trip to Jaipur from Dream Cab and I must say that it was possibly the best last-minute decision. The cab arrived within an hour of booking and Naresh was the most humble and patient driver I have ever ridden with. Mostly the journey starts with all good behavior and by the end of the trip, drivers get frustrated and impatient. This was not the case here and that's why I would recommend booking the services. Kudos to the owner Mahender Ji who was equally humble and took my request last minute and arranged the best driver Naresh. Naresh suggested the day tour and completed it without a single issue.

Name: chaudhurysid
Title: Well Mannered Driver & Clean Taxi
Review: Our trip was to Jaipur & Agra. Our driver was Om Prakash.The car that we got was neat and clean. The driver was courteous.On my request they arranged for government-approved tourist guides at both locations.Mr Sanjay at Jaipur and Mr Bhupendra at Agra.Both were knowledgeable about their respective cities and the attractions they showed us. Mr Bhupendra went out of his way to help us in shopping at Agra.All the guides and drivers waited very patiently at all the destinations/ hotels/ restaurants that we went too.I will recommend their service for anyone that wants a cab from Jaiour.

Name: Abhiram
Title: Dream taxi service review
Review: Great experience. Car in great condition. Driver knows all internal routes very well. Highly recommend their service.

Name: Mohan Gupta
Title: Highly recommended
Review: I booked a day trip to Jaipur from Dream Cab and I must say that it was possibly the best last-minute decision. The cab arrived within an hour of booking and Naresh was the most humble and patient driver I have ever ridden with. Mostly the journey starts with all good behavior and by the end of the trip, drivers get frustrated and impatient. This was not the case here and that's why I would recommend booking the services. Kudos to the owner Mahender Ji who was equally humble and took my request last minute and arranged the best driver Naresh. Naresh suggested the day tour and completed it without a single issue.

Name: Akhil Vaibhaw
Title: Awesome and amazing
Review: We hired their services for tour in Jaipur, our driver Mr. Brajvashi Vaishnav was very polite, helpful and cooperative. Their services are really good. I loved their attitude and professionalism. Everyone must use their services during tour in Rajasthan as their rates are also reasonable.
